original: bhāgaguṇābhyāṃ tatvāntaraṃ vṛttiḥ sambandhārthaṃ sarpatīti / KapSs_5.107 /

original: ūṣmajāṇḍajajarāyujodbhijjasāṅkālpika sāṃsiddhikaṃ ceti na niyamaḥ / KapSs_5.111 /
analyzed: ūṣma ja aṇḍa ja jarāyu ja udbhid ja sāṅkālpika sāṃsiddhikam ca iti na niyamaḥ

original: dvayoriva trayasyāpi dṛṣṭatvāt na tu dvau / KapSs_5.118 /
analyzed: dvayoḥ iva trayasya api dṛṣṭa tvāt na tu dvau

original: vāsanayā na svārthakhyāpanaṃ doṣayoge 'pi na nimittasya pradhānabādhakatvaṃ / KapSs_5.119 /

original: ekaḥ saṃskāraḥ kriyānirvartakaḥ na tu pratikriyaṃ saṃskārabhedā bahukalpanāprasakteḥ / KapSs_5.120 /
analyzed: ekaḥ saṃskāraḥ kriyā nirvartakaḥ na tu pratikriyam saṃskāra bhedāḥ bahu kalpanā prasakteḥ  /
